name: Necesito Healing
description:
In this game, you are a support mage, hired by the kingdom ("El reino"), to defend their best knights against a horde of enemies (pecadores) sent by the devil kingdom.

Do the different tasks sent by god (minigames) to gain mana and cast your spells to defend your allies from death. Survive until the enemy forces stop coming to win. Don't let your amigos die.

Challenges:

- Spanglish (All spells casted by the player are in spanglish)

Sebastian - Programmer

Julian- Programmer

Valentina- Game Art

SFX: dustyroom.com
